crf::crfConfig

crf::crfConfig Class Reference

This class extends the basic eqOsg config class with support vor event forwarding to the pipe's viewer. More...

Detailed Description

This class extends the basic eqOsg config class with support vor event forwarding to the pipe's viewer.
